SEARCH
Package org.codehaus.mojo.versions.change

Interface VersionChanger

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractVersionChanger, CompositeVersionChanger, DependencyVersionChanger, ParentVersionChanger, PluginVersionChanger, ProjectVersionChanger
public interface VersionChanger
An abstract version changer, capable of changing versions of a given dependency.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    apply(DependencyVersionChange versionChange)
    Applies the implemented change on the given dependency.

  • Method Details

    • apply

      void apply(DependencyVersionChange versionChange) throws XMLStreamException
      Applies the implemented change on the given dependency.
      Parameters:
      versionChange - dependency to be changed
      Throws:
      XMLStreamException - thrown if the underlying XML operation does not succeed
